metadataAttributes.Title: Drug Development Product Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Drugs: From Target Discovery to Patients. Familiarize yourself with the process of drug discovery, drug development and drug commercialization, in this new specialization from University of California, San Diego!
metadataAttributes.Skills: Marketing, Drug Regulations, Drug Discovery, Clinical Trials, Pharmacology, Drug Development, Clinical Development, Pharmacokinetics, Clinical Research, Clinical Trial Design,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Williams S. Ettouati, Pharm.D. ,Joseph D. Ma ,
